com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment

Class MapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.IMapFragment
        • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.MapFragment

  • public class MapFragment
extends IMapFragment
    Fragment which is displaying on an interactive google maps the list of locations of a retailer. This fragment only makes sense when the google play services are installed on the phone. Possible arguments are:
    • Retailer.ID
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Dmo.ID
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Card.ID
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier

      <any> onCreateLoader(int id, android.os.Bundle args)
      If we have the retailer id, load the list of locations, otherwise load the retailer id, from the card id or from the dmo id.
